name: Trials OffRoad Challenge
description:
Trials OffRoad Challenge is the fun of driving in the hill and on dangerous path of jeep rally. The offroad environment is the best extreme hill racing game you will ever play.Be a furious off-road racing driver on several different environments for you. No need to brake because of city traffic parking or racing other rival vehicles, so you can perform illegal stunt actions and run full speed
FEATURES
Full real HUD including revs, gear and speed.
ABS, TC and ESP simulation. You can also turn them off!
Explore a detailed open world environment.
Realistic car damage. Crash your car!
Accurate driving physics.
Control your car with a steering wheel, accelerometer or arrows
